detail_desc: Metal and plastic earrings in various sizes and designs. Length from 3 cm to 7.5 cm.

Warm-lined boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details and a padded shaft with a faux fur trim. Adjustable elasticated lacing at the front, a zip in one side and reflective details. Pile linings and insoles.

Boxy-style jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a fully-fashioned section at the top. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the top. Zip fly and button, a low crotch and wide, gently tapered legs.
Ankle-length trousers in washed stretch twill with a zip fly, front pockets and decorative seams on the back pockets. Flared legs with raw-edge hems.

Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap and a flap with a tassel and concealed magnetic fastener. One inner compartment. Imitation suede lining. Size 10.5x24x32 cm.
Blouse in a cotton weave with embroidered details. Small stand-up collar, buttons down the front and long, wide sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Shirt in patterned viscose with a resort collar, French front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Straight-cut hem, slightly longer at the back.
Short jersey skirt with concealed elastication at the waist.
Round bag in braided paper straw with cotton canvas details. Two handles at the top. Width approx. 9 cm. Diameter approx. 38.5 cm. Height of handles 30 cm.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, short, wide sleeves and a gathered yoke at the back. Concealed zip in one side, seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Felted wool beret. Unlined.
Oversized top in patterned sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dance leotard in glossy jersey with crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Glittery elasticated seam at the waist and a layered tulle skirt. Lined gusset.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit containing some wool with a lined hood. Cable-knit front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Bikini briefs in cotton and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
Striped T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Wide, calf-length, pleated skirt in satin with a high waist with covered elastication. Unlined.
Short-sleeved Henley shirts in soft jersey with a round neck and button placket.
Short dress in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back, narrow grosgrain shoulder straps and a seam at the hem with a wide flounce.
Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs with one pair of hoops.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs.
5-pocket trousers in washed, superstretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Short V-neck dress in lace with a concealed zip at the back, long, straight sleeves and a seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Imitation suede cap with an embroidered appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Non-wired, V-neck body in lace with cap sleeves and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck, a lined gusset with concealed press-studs and cutaway coverage at the back.

Shirt in a textured cotton blend with a grandad collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Fully lined bikini top with a knot at the front and no fastening.
Ankle-length suit trousers in a crêpe weave. High waist with pleats, a zip fly and button, pockets in the side seams and fake welt back pockets. Gently tapered legs with creases.
Cardigan in soft, moss-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Gently fitted, long-sleeved, V-neck dress in viscose satin with sheer chiffon.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, ties at the top, a yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons.
Long-sleeved all-in-one pyjamas in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with press-stud fastenings.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a round neck and flutter sleeves. One with an all-over print and one with a print motif on the front.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Slim Fit.
Scarf in a soft, checked weave with fringes along the short sides. Size 35x180 cm.
Short, tie-hem shirt in a lightweight viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Trainers in fabric and imitation leather with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft cotton. Short-sleeved jersey top. Shorts in woven fabric with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist.
High-waisted shorts in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and short slits in the sides.
Hat in braided paper straw. Band with a metal decoration. Width of brim approx. 11 cm.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Jacquard-knit socks in a cotton blend with elasticated, roll-edge tops.
Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Round neckline with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and short puff sleeves with smocked trims. Unlined.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend. Low-cut neckline and slits in the sides.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with crossover mesh shoulder straps and decorative straps at the back. Elasticated hem. Light support.

Soft, non-wired bra top in ribbed fabric designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a unique nursing feature. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Boxy-style top in sturdy cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and a decorative V-neck seam at the front. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with decorative seams, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt with high slits in the sides. Partly lined.

Narrow, metal chain belt with a small, detachable bag in imitation leather. Belt with an adjustable carabiner hook fastening. Bag with a flap and press-stud and four internal card compartments. Width of bag 10 cm. Height 7 cm.
Sandals in imitation leather covered in braided straw with a foot strap and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles. Platform 4 cm. Heel 8.5 cm.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, pleated paper bag waist, decorative buttons at the sides, zip fly and button and tapered legs with creases.
Ribbed hat in a soft cotton blend with a decorative faux fur pompom on top and a turn-up hem with a small fabric appliqué.

High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel to hold in and shape the waist containing a concealed key pocket. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Long, oversized T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a rib-trimmed neckline and low dropped shoulders.

Brogue-patterned boots in imitation leather with checked, felted sections. Padded top edge, lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a zip at one side. Canvas linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Straight-cut trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a high waist, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, and wide legs with creases.
A pair of metal hoop earrings decorated with plastic rhinestones.
Linen shirt with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Top in viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.
Fitted, lightweight outdoor jacket in fast-drying thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and extra long sleeves with thumbholes.
Cap with a motif on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Dungaree shorts in washed cotton denim with a chest pocket, adjustable straps with metal fasteners and a fake fly. Side and back pockets, and buttons at the sides.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey.
Fitted top in soft jersey made from a silk and cotton blend with a ballerina neckline and extra-long sleeves.
Short, sleeveless dress in an airy cotton weave with notch lapels and concealed buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets and an adjustable belt with a plastic buckle at the waist. Unlined.
